alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; South Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:08PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN VALENCIA, SOUTHEASTERN SANTA FE AND WESTERN TORRANCE COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM MDT... At 408 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Moriarty to 7 miles southwest of McIntosh to near Abo. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moriarty, Estancia, Mountainair, Willard, McIntosh and Abo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 193 and 215. Highway 285 between Mile Markers 254 and 258. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 195 and 220. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Heavy rains will cause water to pond on roads and in low spots. Fast running water will quickly fill arroyos and ditches.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; South Central Highlands
